biotools.summary: Online variant filtering and prioritisation application. Ontology Variant Analysis Tool can filter your VCF files on a wide array of criteria. Remaining genes are prioritisated based on their functional and phenotypic profile similarity to a user supplied phenotype.

bioschemas.name: OVA
bioschemas.summary: Online variant filtering and prioritisation application. Ontology Variant Analysis Tool can filter your VCF files on a wide array of criteria. Remaining genes are prioritisated based on their functional and phenotypic profile similarity to a user supplied phenotype.
